title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7354.6 - Heating control
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7354.6 - Heating control

State Regulations

Each facility shall maintain an adequate heating system
which shall safely heat all appropriate areas of the facility and which fully
complies with all applicable laws, codes, rules and regulations related to
heating systems. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7354.6

Adopted

New

York State Register September 26, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 39, eff. 9/26/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
